title: 02/01/2021 - HOUR 1 - Stafford, McVay, Patriots
itunes:title: 02/01/2021 - HOUR 1 - Stafford, McVay, Patriots
description:
Rams trading for Matt Stafford is all about trusting Sean McVay.

Stafford wanted no part of the Patriots.

Guest: Scott Pioli
